name: Crimson Shambler
description: The Crimson Shambler resembles a bloody zombie, with a hideous appearance and a fungal nature. Its body is covered in crimson slime, and it performs grotesque movements.
memorable: It can inflict a deadly disease that transforms victims into new shamblers, making it a persistent threat.
goals: To infect living creatures and create new shamblers.
relations: May be encountered alongside other undead or plant-based creatures, often in decayed or corrupted areas.
environment: Commonly found in swamps, graveyards, or places of decay.
strengths: Immunity to acid and poison, along with the ability to disguise itself as a zombie.
weaknesses: Lacks high agility and is reliant on its disease mechanic for offensive capabilities.
attacks: Slam delivers bludgeoning and acid damage; Slime Glob inflicts acid damage and can infect targets with spores.
most_powerful_ability: The Spores ability can kill and transform infected creatures into new shamblers, creating more threats.
senses: Blindsight up to 60 feet allows it to detect creatures nearby without relying on sight.
additional_information: Can create new shamblers from its victims.
Requires intelligence checks to see through its disguise.
Triggers spores when physically touched or hit.
Immunities to being blinded, deafened, or poisoned.
The diseased condition can lead to gradual transformation into a Crimson Shambler.
test_queries: plant that transforms victims into shamblers
creature resembling a zombie with lethal spores
